name: residency
description: Sing and verify text payload and image.

scripts.genkeys: mkdir -p trust && cd trust && openssl genpkey -algorithm RSA -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_bits:4096 -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_pubexp:3 -out key.pem && openssl pkey -in key.pem -out key.pub -pubout
scripts.genkeys2: mkdir -p trust && cd trust && openssl genpkey -algorithm RSA -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_bits:1024 -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_pubexp:3 -out key.pem && openssl pkey -in key.pem -out key.pub -pubout
